```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_minimal(15))

cuts <- diamonds %>% 
  group_by(cut) %>% 
  summarize(mean_price = mean(price, na.rm = TRUE))

ggplot(cuts, aes(mean_price, cut)) +
  geom_col(color = "magenta",
           fill = "magenta",
           alpha = 0.6)
```
